title: Georgia - Poverty rate 2000 to 2018
summary: This is a line chart with an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Percentage of population, containing a total of 19 data points.
Overall Percentage of population has increased over the Year.
The most drastic increase took place within the Year 2008 and 2009.
Maximum Percentage of population, about 19.2 was reported at Year 2012
The lowest Percentage of population, of value 11.7 was reported at Year 2001
min_summary: The chart at hand is a line chart where the x axis denotes Year and a y axis denotes Percentage of population. In total the number of data points it has is 19.
In general Percentage of population has rose over the Year.

Percentage of population is roughly decreasing from 2000 to 2001, slightly increasing from 2001 to 2004, roughly constant from 2004 to 2008, gradually increasing from 2008 to 2011, roughly constant from 2011 to 2013, and lastly slightly decreasing from 2013 to 2018.
